mapper.insert: INSERT INTO app_file_upload (description,processTypeId,processHeaderId,receiptCode,receiptId,fileClass,finalName,filePath,fileSize,orgId,attr1,attr2,attr3,createUserId,createUserCode,createUserName,createDate,updateUserId,updateUserCode,updateUserName,updateDate) values (#{description},#{processTypeId},#{processHeaderId},#{receiptCode},#{receiptId},#{fileClass},#{finalName},#{filePath},#{fileSize},#{orgId},#{attr1},#{attr2},#{attr3},#{createUserId},#{createUserCode},#{createUserName},#{createDate},#{updateUserId},#{updateUserCode},#{updateUserName},#{updateDate}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE updateDate=#{createDate},description=#{description},finalName=#{finalName},filePath=#{filePath},fileSize=#{fileSize},attr1=#{attr1},attr2=#{attr2},attr3=#{attr3},removed=0,enabled=1

select app_file_upload_seq.nextval as id from dual
MERGE INTO app_file_upload dest USING (SELECT #{attr1} attr1, #{receiptId} receiptId, #{fileClass} fileClass FROM dual) src ON ( (dest.attr1 = src.attr1 AND dest.receiptId = src.receiptId AND dest.fileClass = src.fileClass) ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET updateDate=#{createDate},description=#{description},finalName=#{finalName},filePath=#{filePath},fileSize=#{fileSize},attr1=#{attr1},attr2=#{attr2},attr3=#{attr3},removed=0,enabled=1 WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (id,description,processTypeId,processHeaderId,receiptCode,receiptId,fileClass,finalName,filePath,fileSize,orgId,attr1,attr2,attr3,createUserId,createUserCode,createUserName,createDate,updateUserId,updateUserCode,updateUserName,updateDate) VALUES (#{id},#{description},#{processTypeId},#{processHeaderId},#{receiptCode},#{receiptId},#{fileClass},#{finalName},#{filePath},#{fileSize},#{orgId},#{attr1},#{attr2},#{attr3},#{createUserId},#{createUserCode},#{createUserName},#{createDate},#{updateUserId},#{updateUserCode},#{updateUserName},#{updateDate})
mapper.update:
UPDATE app_file_upload SET enabled=#{enabled},updateUserId=#{updateUserId},updateUserCode=#{updateUserCode},updateUserName=#{updateUserName},updateDate=#{updateDate} WHERE id IN
#{item}
mapper.delete: UPDATE app_file_upload SET removed=1,enabled=0 WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE app_file_upload SET removed=1,enabled=0 WHERE id IN
#{item}
